Replace.Text: If you have any problem, just let me know.
No
I have never seen your physique before. If possible, I would like to examine you carefully.
Thank you for your care, I will definitely repay you in my own way.
Well, whatever
A fire in a fan can start a prairie fire
I'll give you a ride!
I have already settled the messenger you sent, so you can rest assured.
I am busy today, so I am not able to receive you.
I made some cakes, I hope they suit your taste.
The wind does not last all morning, and the rain does not last all day
If you are an enemy of the people, there is no cure.
Hello, stranger, you donâ€™t look like a local. Are you here to visit a sick person or seek medical treatment?
Welcome to Xuheng. If you don't mind, please follow me on a tour.
Well, I accept your invitation.
Would you like to mark your city on the map? In exchange, I will also tell you the location of Xuheng
Show off your power, and you will eventually perish on your own
I hope your promise can be fulfilled
In this vast land, why do we stay in a corner here?
Short-sighted person
I know you are very curious about the Sifangyuan, but I understand that we should not take such measures.
presumptuous!
Do unto others, do not impose on others
You will reap what you sow
Luck is unpredictable....
Many thanks
Many thanks
Many thanks
No problem
No problem
No problem

If you don't see the people, you don't know their suffering. Now that I have seen the people and know their suffering, it is difficult for me to sit back and do nothing about it (you have too many cities with insufficient livability)
Lingguang is angry that you have failed to live up to the expectations of the citizens.
Tianyuan Divine Realm-Clarifying the Heart
Divine Realm Tianyuan
Lingguang
From dust to dust, from ashes to ashes
Tiannan Famen

After creating a capital, you will immediately gain Jinwu and Lingguang, all cities will be permanently loyal, and units will recover health at the start of the turn without being stationed. {LOC_HAPPINESS_CONTENT_NAME}'s cities gain +10% [ICON_Production][ICON_Gold][ICON_Faith][ICON_Culture][ICON_Science] non-food output, {LOC_HAPPINESS_HAPPY_NAME} and {LOC_HAPPINESS_ECSTATIC_NAME}'s cities gain +10% [ICON_Production][ICON_Gold][ICON_Faith][ICON_Culture][ICON_Science] non-food output, [ICON_Science] science value and [ICON_Culture] culture value + 10%, -25% [ICON_Production] [ICON_Gold] [ICON_Faith] [ICON_Culture] [ICON_Science] non-food output for {LOC_HAPPINESS_DISPLEASED_NAME}, {LOC_HAPPINESS_UNHAPPY_NAME}, {LOC_HAPPINESS_UNREST_NAME}, and {LOC_HAPPINESS_REVOLT_NAME}'s cities, +1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity for courtyards, +3 [ICON_Amenities] amenity for shrines and markets, +2 [ICON_Amenities] amenity for non-capital cities created by you.
I know that this world is vast and full of suffering. However, the sage's method can be used by all people. What I have done is far from enough. - Ling Guang
A doctor's heart
Dislikes civilizations with a large number of cities with low amenity levels
